words.source: H6605 (פָּתַח, 'to open'), HC/Vqw3fs (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3fs); KJV 'she had opened it', ESV 'she opened it', NASB 'she opened it' — all agree
H7200 (רָאָה, 'to see'), HC/Vqw3fs/Sp3ms (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3fs/suffix-3ms); KJV 'she saw it', ESV 'she saw', NASB 'she saw' — all agree
H3206 (יֶלֶד, 'child/boy'), HTd/Ncmsa (article/noun-common-masculine-singular-absolute); KJV 'the child', ESV 'the child', NASB 'the child' — all agree
H2009 (הִנֵּה, 'behold'), HC/Tm (conjunctive/demonstrative-particle); KJV 'and, behold', ESV 'and behold', NASB 'and behold' — all agree
H5288 (נַעַר, 'boy/youth/lad'), HNcmsa (noun-common-masculine-singular-absolute); KJV 'the babe', ESV 'a baby', NASB 'the boy' — all convey young child
H1058 (בָּכָה, 'to weep'), HVqrmsa (Qal-participle-masculine-singular-absolute); KJV 'wept', ESV 'was crying', NASB 'was crying' — all agree
H2550 (חָמַל, 'to have compassion/spare'), HC/Vqw3fs (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3fs); KJV 'she had compassion', ESV 'She took pity', NASB 'she had pity' — all agree
H5921 (עַל, 'upon/on'), HR/Sp3ms (preposition/suffix-3ms); KJV 'on him', ESV 'on him', NASB 'on him' — all agree
H559 (אָמַר, 'to say'), HC/Vqw3fs (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3fs); KJV 'she said', ESV 'She said', NASB 'she said' — all agree
H3206 (יֶלֶד, 'child'), HR/Ncmpc (preposition-min/noun-common-masculine-plural-construct); KJV 'of the Hebrews' children', ESV 'of the Hebrews' children', NASB 'of the Hebrews' — all agree
H5680 (עִבְרִי, 'Hebrew'), HTd/Ngmpa (article/gentilic-masculine-plural-absolute); KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'the Hebrews'
H2088 (זֶה, 'this'), HPdxms (pronoun-demonstrative-masculine-singular); KJV 'This is', ESV 'This is', NASB 'This is' — all agree
